text: What's the easiest way to have (and test on a live page) a "dev" branch? I had a team member start using a template that I had clearly labelled as "development" -- because our existing templates suck -- but I am worried about breaking their (published) work while I develop a larger, more complex theme.
I think there’s a bug in HubSpot’s CSS combiner - how would I best report this?
I would submit a support ticket on this. Can you also DM me the ticket id you get back and I can look internally on it as well.
yes! I will submit it now and then DM you
